short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build your personal knowledge base with Chipi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found yourself not being able to answer a question you've been asked already a few times in the past?
Do you need to group different resources under one name, client or project name for example?

With Chipi you can tag emails, Slack conversations, Google docs, Trello cards and now also Web URLs.

Use this extension to tag Web urls and then search for that tag on your Chipi desktop app. You can save multiple urls under the same tag.
